Don’t forget! We’re hosting a webinar series for PSEG customers and would like to remind you that the last webinar of the series is this week. Learn why so many PSEG customers have already gone solar and how solar could dramatically shave your PSEG bill. Have you reserved your spot?
#4: Renewable Energy’s Perfect Storm <http://pages.directenergysolar.com/solar-webinar-renewable-energy-perfect-storm-december-16-2015.html> December 16th, 7–7:30 PM Understand how energy market trends finally turned the tide from centuries of burning fossil fuels to Central New Jersey’s mass adoption of today’s affordable renewable.
Meet your local solar team at Direct Energy Solar and learn the latest on solar in our market.
WHAT YOU’LL LEARN: • How solar saves you money on your energy costs • What drives your cost of solar, and how much you may save • Local incentives that help you save even more • Why you need to decide soon, before the 30% federal tax credit expires • No-money-down financing, purchase, and lease options—which are right for you?
